changeSet.author: tk
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE , username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_id PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: tk
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE field ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE , name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, instructor_id BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_id PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_user_fields FOREIGN KEY (instructor_id) REFERENCES user (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: tk
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE field_student( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT UNIQUE , student_id BIGINT NOT NULL, field_id BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_id PRIMARY KEY(id), CONSTRAINT Fk_student_user FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES user (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT Fk_field_cs FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES field (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT uq_cs UNIQUE (student_id, field_id) );
